elements.title: Elver Eating World Championships (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that no elvers (examples pictured) are eaten during the Elver Eating World Championships?

elements.title: Reina Scully (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Reina Scully has worked with Crunchyroll because of her skill in translating Japanese anime for English dubs?

elements.title: a 1990 video game (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the player of a 1990 video game can recreate the 14.5-hour-long Battle of Rorke's Drift in real time, controlling each of the 137 British defenders?

elements.title: Gemma Frizelle (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that rhythmic gymnast Gemma Frizelle won a gold medal at the 2022 Commonwealth Games performing to her mother's favourite song?

elements.title: a South Carolina radio station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that U.S. regulators determined that a South Carolina radio station broadcast from unauthorized facilities for more than 15 years?

elements.title: Leutard of Vertus (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that 11th-century French peasant Leutard of Vertus is said to have preached heresy against the Catholic Church after dreaming his body had been invaded by bees that entered through his genitals?

elements.title: Zodiac Suite (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that nine songs from Mary Lou Williams's Zodiac Suite were composed during a live radio improvisation?

elements.title: Zdravko Ponoš (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Chief of the General Staff Zdravko Ponoš began military cooperation between Serbia and Ohio?
